worldmap 0.1.0
  • Reference

worldmap

This research compendium creates a chloropeth world map in the Robinson projection at the country level based on the IPBES Regions definition.

Usage

  1. Fork the clone onto your GitHub account
  2. Clone your copy
  3. Open the .Rproj
  4. Run the make.R

All dependencies will be installed and a chloropeth map with the demo dataset will be saved in the folder figures/.

If all is good you can add your own dataset, adapt the script and re-launch the make.R.

Cheers!
